Christine Milne

Australian Greens Senator for Tasmania since July 2005

Never rebels explain rebellions 100% attendance explain attendance.

All Votes

All votes Senator Christine Milne could have attended.

  1. 14th Mar 2013 Senate

    Motions — Renewable Energy Certificates

    Not passed by a small majority

    Christine Milne voted No with the Australian Greens

  2. 30th Dec 2009, 12:00 PM Senate

    Proceedural ban of flatulence during divisions

    Not passed by a small majority

    Christine Milne voted Yes with the Australian Greens

  3. 30th Nov 2009, 12:00 PM Senate

    Carbon Pollution Reduction Scheme (Cprs Fuel Credits) Bill 2009 [No. 2]; Carbon Pollution Reduction Scheme Amendment (Household Assistance) Bill 2009 [No. 2] — Third Reading

    Not passed by a small majority

    Christine Milne voted No with the Australian Greens

  4. 25th Nov 2009, 4:13 PM Senate

    Carbon Pollution Reduction Scheme Legislation

    Not passed by a modest majority

    Christine Milne voted No with the Australian Greens
